name: Katowice 2019 Coin
description: This is a commemorative IEM 2019 Katowice CS:GO Major Championship Coin which tracks your progress throughout the event, provides full access to the Katowice 2019 Pick'Em Challenge, exclusive access to Souvenir Packages, Steam.tv chat flairs, and unlimited team graffiti for the duration of the event.\n\nYou can upgrade your Katowice 2019 Coin by completing challenges. You can redeem a Souvenir Package every time you upgrade your Coin.
